channel.description: Recent content in git on Kevin Cui

item.title: Git Alias -- Did You Git It?
item.description: Git alias is powerful and yet simple to set up. I’d like to share my journey in configuring git alias for my personal use. Now let’s dig it and git it! Day 1: Why git alias? I was using Tig for some time. It’s good but not great. The problems I got during the time: It takes time to memorize the default key bindings. Since I’m using Colemak keyboard layout, obviously, the default navigation key bindings need to be adjusted accordingly.
